import { useState } from "react" import { useHistory } from "react-router" function SignUpForm() { const history = useHistory() const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password_digest: '' }) async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/users/`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(user) }) history.push(`/todolist`) } return (

Sign Up

setUser({ ...user, firstName: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="firstName" name="firstName" />
setUser({ ...user, lastName: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="lastName" name="lastName" />
setUser({ ...user, email: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="email" name="email" />
setUser({ ...user, password_digest: e.target.value })} className="form-control" id="password_digest" name="password_digest" />
) } export default SignUpForm
